section_title: Rating of industrial and freight-transport hereditaments.
section_text: 1 No reduction in rateable value shall be made under section sixty-eight of the  Local Government Act, 1929 (which provided for relief from rates in respect of industrial and freight-transport hereditaments) for the purposes of valuation lists coming into force after the passing of this Act.

12 1 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  6 For the avoidance of doubt it is hereby declared that for the purposes of the  Education Act, 1944, the expenses of maintaining a voluntary school include the payment of rates.

29   1 This Act may be cited as the Rating and Valuation Act 1961. 2 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  3 . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  4 This Act shall not extend to Scotland or to Northern Ireland.
